title: Saguaro National Park: Not So Junior Ranger Program
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Junior Ranger Programs     Not So Junior Ranger Program                Not So Junior Ranger Program         Saguaro's new Not So Junior Ranger Program booklet cover. NPS image  A full color workbook is now available at both Visitor Centers to lead you to new discoveries in the Park. Activities will take you into the field to explore visitor centers and trails, record your findings, and try to maximize your score--just for fun! The workbook is aimed at families, young adults, and senior passholders who have a half day or more to spend on either side of the park. Just talk to anyone at an information desk to get the book and instructions for an exciting new way to experience Saguaro National Park.
